column2:
"Oh, <%me>!
Would you please listen to what Hitsugi has to say?"
"I never thought I'd be spending summer with Harriet and Hitsugi!"
"This is a very special occasion. I hope we can make lots of fun memories."
"Whew, it's hot. The sunshine is so strong up here."
"We'll need to apply sunscreen thoroughly if we want to avoid getting burned."
"Eh...? You think the red ribbons on this swimsuit look good on me?"
"Really? That makes me so happy. Thank you!"
"I think I could improve the flavor of my omurice if I work at it, but..."
"First, I want to get better at writing in ketchup!"
